byline.contributor: Neil MacFarquhar reported from Moscow, and Tim Arango from Istanbul. Ceylan Yeginsu contributed reporting from Istanbul, and Ivan Nechepurenko from Moscow.
byline.original: By NEIL MacFARQUHAR and TIM ARANGO

abstract: Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan is traveling to St Peterburg to meet with Russian counterpart Pres Vladimir V Putin to discuss Syria and trade.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The Turkish president, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, is visiting his Russian counterpart, Vladimir V. Putin, to discuss Syria and trade.
snippet: The Turkish president, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, is visiting his Russian counterpart, Vladimir V. Putin, to discuss Syria and trade....

headline.main: Putin and Erdogan, Both Isolated, Reach Out to Each Other
headline.print_headline: Erdogan and Putin Seek to Put Syria Rift in Past
